mobilitydetection.hdm.kk104.com.mobilitydetectionlibrary.helpers

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • mobilitydetection.hdm.kk104.com.mobilitydetectionlibrary.helpers.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends Object
    Class for persisting to and reading data from JSON and SharedPreferences.

      • getWifiLocation

        public Double[] getWifiLocation(String ssid)
        Returns the location of a wifi network
        Parameters:
        ssid - SSID of the wifi network
        Returns:
        Double[] tuple. First value is the latitude. Second value is the longitude.

      • getWifiConnectionTime

        public String getWifiConnectionTime(String ssid)
        Returns the total connection time as a String timestamp.
        Parameters:
        ssid - SSID of the wifi network
        Returns:
        a String timestamp with the following pattern yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss
